snippet: “Jeffrey Gibson: Said the Pigeon to the Squirrel” embodies two sweeping trends in contemporary art: feverishly bright geometric abstraction and the creative reuse of found objects.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews Said the Pigeon to the Squirrel, exhibition of works by painter Jeffrey Gibson at the National Academy Museum.
lead_paragraph: “Jeffrey Gibson: Said the Pigeon to the Squirrel” embodies two sweeping trends in contemporary art: feverishly bright geometric abstraction and the creative reuse of found objects.

headline.seo: Jeffrey Gibson Injects Visual Pizazz Into Found Objects
headline.main: Mash-Ups Star in a Homage to American Indians
headline.print_headline: Mash-Ups Star in a Homage to American Indians
